abstract: Winner - Secondary Live Action. "Because people were everywhere, I belonged nowhere".
description: Finbar is a young man who is obsessed with pi.  His fragile existence is thrown into tumult when he discovers a mysterious note in his locker...  Under the category 'Secondary Live Action', Blake Whelan, ACT, was the Screen It 2012 winner.
